page.title: 02GREAT MEOLS: THE SCHOOL.
page.content: Great Meols Primary School is situated in Deeside(Wirral L.E.A.).and until 1982 operated on two sites;an annexe built 101 years ago and the main building built in 1964.The school caters for children in the 4+to11+ age range.There are{371}children on role divided amongst{13 classes.26 adults are employed.Parents are used as ancillary help. Many children remain at school at lunch time:131 buying cafeteria meals, 236 bringing sandwiches,4 going home. The school has a flourishing{P.T.A.} which, through various fund- raising activities, has provided the children with many additional facilities. In addition to their schoolwork children enjoy a variety of extra activities which include:Inter-school quizes,netball,gymnastics,chess, football,cycling and drama.
